document.full_text: the army corps of engineers is close to ordering the partial opening of a spillway that would flood part of south louisiana to avoid catastrophic flooding in another part of the state.
document.title: officials in louisiana face dilemma: bad flooding, or worse
lines_and_colors: the army corps of engineers is close to ordering the partial opening of a spillway that would flood part of south louisiana to avoid catastrophic flooding in another part of the state.
